sources.title: Road House
sources.description: Title: Road House Summary: A night club owner becomes infatuated with a torch singer and frames his best friend/manager for embezzlement when the chanteuse falls in love with him. Directed by: Jean Negulesco Actors: Ida Lupino, Cornel Wilde, Celeste Holm Production Company: Twentieth Century Fox Release Date: 4 November 1948 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Jefty, owner of a roadhouse in a backwoods town, hires sultry, tough-talking torch singer Lily Stevens against the advice of his manager Pete Morgan. Jefty is smitten with Lily, who in turn exerts her charms on the more resistant Pete. When Pete finally falls for her and she turns down Jefty's marriage proposal, they must face Jefty's murderous jealousy and his twisted plots to "punish" the two.
